scenes.narration: The session is over. The fan just finished. What you do NOW determines if they ever come back. Aftercare is one of the most underrated skills in chatting.

scenes.narration: After a session ends, fans often feel empty or regretful. This is called the Post-Session Drop. Aftercare prevents this. Good aftercare makes the fan feel valued, not used. That emotional connection is what makes them come back and buy again. The number one rule. The aftercare after a first sexting is the most important aftercare you will ever do. That first session sets the tone for everything. And never go cold after a session. The conversation continues. The mood just shifts.

scenes.heading: Aftercare Scripts + Re-engagement

visuals.description: "That was amazing" — make them feel special
Reference something specific from the session
Plant the seed for the next session
Bring back inactive fans with hooks and callbacks

visuals.text: Aftercare is also the BEST time to pitch customs. The fan is emotionally connected.

scenes.narration: Aftercare has three scripts. AC one is Validation. Make them feel amazing about what just happened. AC two is the Personal Touch. Reference something specific from the session. Something only they said. AC three is the Future Hook. Plant the seed for the next session. Something to look forward to. Then there's Re-engagement. RE one and RE two are for bringing back inactive fans with hooks and callbacks. And here's a pro tip. Aftercare is also the best time to pitch customs. The fan is emotionally connected and more likely to say yes.

scenes.narration: Let me show you the difference. Good aftercare sounds like, that was so intense babe, you always know how to make me feel things. Bad aftercare is saying okay bye, or just going silent after the session. The difference is massive. Fans who get good aftercare are three times more likely to buy again. Every conversation has one goal, a sale. And aftercare ensures the next sale happens.
